text: Jollof (), or jollof rice, is a rice dish from West Africa. It is made with long-grain rice, tomatoes, chilies, onions, and spices. Sometimes people add other vegetables. Sometimes they add meat. It is cooked in one pot. People cook it it in different ways and change the ingredients in different places. Jollof rice is from the Senegambian region. ==References== Category:Rice dishes Category:Beninese food Category:Togolese food Category:Gambian food Category:Senegalese food Category:Nigerian food Category:Ghanaian food Category:Ivorian food
title: Jollof rice
